Plot: A documentary filmmaker travels to Jellystone Park to shoot a project and soon crosses paths with Yogi Bear, his sidekick Boo-Boo, and Ranger Smith.
Title: Yogi Bear
Writer: Jennifer Ventimilia, Joshua Sternin, Brad Copeland
Actors: Dan Aykroyd, Justin Timberlake, Anna Faris, Tom Cavanagh
tomatoConsensus: Yogi Bear's 3D effects and all-star voice cast are cold comfort for its aggressively mediocre screenplay.
